snippet: In solidarity with an American official whom the mayor of Ankara called a “stupid blonde,” Ambassador John R. Bass posted an altered photo of himself.
abstract: John R Bass, United States ambassador to Turkey, posts humorous photo of himself on Twitter in response to tweets by Ankara Mayor Melih Gokcek that referred to State Dept spokeswoman Marie Harf as 'stupid blonde'; Gokcek had criticized Harf for her silence on use of force by Baltimore police when she had denounced Turkey for crackdown on protesters in 2013.
lead_paragraph: In solidarity with an American official whom the mayor of Ankara called a “stupid blonde,” Ambassador John R. Bass posted an altered photo of himself.

headline.main: U.S. Ambassador to Turkey Says, ‘We’re All Blonde’
headline.print_headline: Ankara Mayor’s Tweets Prompt U.S. Ambassador to ‘Go Blond’
